name: js-memory-record
description: A simple library that handles a few records easily
author: Akira Ikeda <pinpon.ikeda@gmail.com>

scripts.build:commit: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m '[chore] npm run build'
scripts.push: npm test && npm run build:commit && git push
scripts.release: npm run build:commit && npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish
